thread.title: Antoine Griezmann’s brother fuels Man United rumours with tweet
thread.title_full: Antoine Griezmann’s brother fuels Man United rumours with tweet

author: James
title: Antoine Griezmann’s brother fuels Man United rumours with tweet
text:
Antoine Griezmann’s brother fuels Man United rumours with tweet By James   Theo Griezmann gets the people going 
It’s a done deal so, right? Antoine Griezmann’s brother tweeting about Manchester United isn’t exactly on a par with putting pen to paper but it sends social media into a frenzy all the same. ‘Griezmann to United confirmed’ was the gist of the reactions to Theo Griezmann’s comment on Memphis Depay moving to Lyon. The Dutch winger made his debut for the French side in Ligue 1 last night. He came on as a substitute in their 3-1 win over Marseille. Sorry Memphis i think old trafford is better ! pic.twitter.com/ROFTTYHNJL 
— Théo Griezmann (@TheoGriezmann) January 22, 2017 
It was an impressive cameo but Theo couldn’t resist telling Memphis that he took a big step down. He wrote: ‘Sorry, Memphis, I think Old Trafford is better!’ An unnecessary comment to make and bound to fuel speculation. The future of Antoine 
It would appear as though Theo wants his brother to head to United should he leave Atletico Madrid. Recent reports indicate that a summer move is on the cards. However, the forward’s last goal celebration will worry United fans. Loading tags...
